name: Candy Crops (FunkyFreshTyGamin')
description:
Candy Crops

Originally for the secret santa jam, Candy Crops combines the joys of farming with a sweet new twist. Grow new candies, sell them to the puppers, and make it big as a candy farmer!

How to Play

-Go to the shop to purchase some seeds

-Drag the seeds to some farmland to start growing them

-Click on the candy once it's grown to sell it to the dog

-Rinse and repeat

And Thank You For Playing My Game :))
